I think this is good and should be merged

I don't think so, no. See comment above: not familiar with Devise, but it looks like we'd exchange the error message in the no method error: new_user_session_path is not defined, either.

body:
> I think this is good and should be merged

I don't think so, no. See comment above: not familiar with Devise, but it looks like we'd exchange the error message in the no method error:  `new_user_session_path` is not defined, either.
